title: Track Container Demurrage Charges
description: An import container has been sitting in the yard beyond its free time allowance. The system must track and bill the storage charges (demurrage).

tasks.description: The system identifies a container that has exceeded its free time (e.g., 5 days).
tasks.expected_outcome: A daily report is generated showing all containers that have entered demurrage.

tasks.description: The system automatically begins calculating daily storage charges based on the port tariff.
tasks.expected_outcome: A charge is automatically added to the container's record each day.

tasks.description: When the container is finally picked up, the total accumulated demurrage charge is added to the invoice for the shipping line.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final bill includes the total storage charges for the container.
